snippet: Some right-wing Israeli politicians attributed the killing of Sariya Ofer, a colonel in the reserves, to terrorism and called on Israel to stop releasing Palestinian security prisoners.
abstract: Sariya Ofer, Israeli man who was a colonel in the reserves, is fatally bludgeoned in the Jordan Valley area of the West Bank; it is not clear whether killing was politically motivated terrorist attack or criminal act.
lead_paragraph: Some right-wing Israeli politicians attributed the killing of Sariya Ofer, a colonel in the reserves, to terrorism and called on Israel to stop releasing Palestinian security prisoners.

headline.main: Israeli Man Fatally Bludgeoned in West Bank
